document.full_text: the dollar hovered around three-year lows on friday and looked set to come under further pressure next week, while a stronger yen weighed on tokyo stocks in holiday-thinned good friday trade.
document.title: u.s. dollar frail, tokyo stocks slip, gold shines
lines_and_colors: the dollar hovered around three-year lows on friday and looked set to come under further pressure next week, while a stronger yen weighed on tokyo stocks in holiday-thinned good friday trade.
